name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Site Reliability Engineer with 13+ years of experience in observability, DevOps practices, and automating high-performance applications within the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **Kubernetes**, **AWS**, **Terraform**, and observability tools such as **Prometheus** and **Grafana** for system monitoring and performance enhancement. Adept at implementing GitOps practices and building robust CI/CD pipelines using **GitHub Actions**. 
Skilled in multiple programming languages including **Python**, **Java**, and **C++**, with a strong foundation in microservices and event-driven architectures. Experienced in driving compliance with regulatory standards and building AI/ML-powered solutions utilizing **MLflow** and **Kubeflow** for model orchestration. Excellent communication and collaboration skills, dedicated to delivering reliable and efficient system performance.
